alert.note: Alert for Chukchi Sea Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 16 at 3:17PM AKST until November 17 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Elevated water levels and large breaking waves will cause high surf. * WHERE...Chukchi Sea Coast from Red Dog Port north. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Waves will wash to the top of the beach. Beach erosion will occur. Minor flooding of low lying areas along the coast is possible. Ice may push onto the beach. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong south winds will decrease slightly tonight but continue through Thursday evening. This will cause elevated sea levels and large waves, which will cause high surf from Red Dog Port north.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
